attributes.action: Launch an enquiry into the awful free school meal parcels being sent to families
attributes.additional_details:
We demand that you:

- Investigate who signed off on the companies supplying the food parcels.
- What the nature of their relationship is, and if there is any corruption.
- Make public the total costs paid for these contracts, including costs spent on the food parcels vs their actual value. 
- Hold any parties responsible for profiteering from this process to account. 

It's clear that someone is profiting from this whole mess, at the taxpayers expense and that of the poor. Fix it.
attributes.background: The free school meal parcels being supplied to the needy are inhumane and despicable, and someone is profiting from this. We demand that our government investigates who approved this procurement and holds those to account both in the government and private sector.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Hold an inquiry into contracts providing relief food packages
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569756
